gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Grizzlies 106, Spurs 98
gameRecap.excerpt: The Grizzlies defeat the Spurs, 106-98.  Ja Morant led the way with 26 points, five rebounds and 10 assists for the Grizzlies, while Desmond Bane added 24 points (11-17 FG) in the victory.  Victor Wembanyama tallied 20 points, seven rebounds and four blocks for the Spurs in the losing effort.  The Grizzlies improve to 11-22 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 5-28.
